attributes.action: ask Her Majesty to appoint Bill Clinton as Prime Minister immediately following Tony Blair's resignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is due to become Prime Minister without being elected. As the UK now appears to have a more Presidential style of government now than in the past, we the undersigned request that Mr Blair requests that Her Majesty may appoint William Jefferson Clinton of the United States of America as the new Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. As Mr Brown does not appear to require election, we believe that it is in the best interest of the British people to appoint President Clinton without election instead.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
